fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hi all,
Your community, {{ content_object.group }}, is all the rage right now. {{ content_object.user.get_full_name }}
({{ content_object.user.email }}) just requested to join.

Click here to accept or deny the request

Thanks for steering your community towards a more efficient future!

Remember, {{ content_object.group }} is a closed community. Anyone who wants to join the
community has to get your nod first. To make it open, modify your community setting.

Kudos,
The Repower at Home team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: Community Join Request
fields.subject: Community Join Request

fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hi {{ content_object.user.first_name }},
You’re in! The community administrator just approved your access to {{ content_object.group }}.

Click here to go to {{ content_object.group }}

On the community page, you can see what your fellow members are doing and how you
stack up. That means now is the time to get your upgrade on! If you’ve already
checked off the featured action, browse the action library to find your next move.
The more actions you do, the more points you and your new group will earn.

Cheers,
The Repower at Home team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: Community Membership Approved
fields.subject: Community Membership Response

fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hi {{ content_object.user.first_name }},
A community administrator turned down your request to join {{ content_object.group }}. But
no worries! There are tons of communities on Repower at Home, including the one that’s
perfect for you.

Click here to find more communities
Click here to create your own

Remember, only closed communities need administrator approval. You can join any
of the open communities at anytime.

Cheers,
The Repower at Home team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: Community Membership Denied
fields.subject: Community Membership Response
